_header: Alas what shall I do for love
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 110
_description: A late love lyric, ascribed to Henry VIII — six lines

BLAdd31922.First Lines: Alas what shall I do for lovefor love alasse what shal I do…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …For loue alasse what shall I doSyth now so kynd I do yow fynde to kepe yow me vnto
